sprint_goal: Establish Secure Multi-tenant Foundation & Salla Connectivity
key_deliverables: Deployed App Shell; Auth System (Login/Logout); Salla OAuth Connection; Background Job Infrastructure
demo_objectives: Login with Merchant Account; Connect Salla Store via OAuth; Trigger a test background job
success_criteria: Production URL active; Auth/OAuth flows passing; QStash job triggers without error
risk_factors: RISK-001 Serverless Timeouts; Salla API documentation gaps
mitigation_strategies: Prioritize TASK-DATA-001 to prove architecture; Early integration testing with Salla sandbox
external_dependencies: Salla Partner Account approval; Upstash provisioning
burndown_target: Stepped burndown based on BE/FE integration points

sprint_goal: Ingest Historical Data & Activate Real-time Dashboard
key_deliverables: Salla Data Sync Logic; ClickHouse Schema; OLAP Pipeline; Basic Dashboard Metrics
demo_objectives: Show populated dashboard with real Salla data; Demonstrate Sync resiliency
success_criteria: 12 months history synced < 1 hour; Dashboard p95 < 200ms
risk_factors: RISK-003 Data Drift; RISK-004 Salla Rate Limits

sprint_goal: Enable Deep Analytics & Cart Recovery Automation
key_deliverables: Sales Forecasting (ETS); Abandoned Cart Job; Email Template Editor
demo_objectives: Show sales forecast chart; Simulate abandoned cart recovery email
success_criteria: Forecast generation successful; Recovery emails triggered correctly
mitigation_strategies: Use Postmark sandbox; Validate ETS against known data

key_deliverables: RAG Pipeline; AI Chat UI; Full Production Deployment
demo_objectives: Ask questions to AI about store data; End-to-end platform demo
success_criteria: AI answers correctly scoped to tenant (RISK-002 mitigation verified)
mitigation_strategies: Strict tenant ID filtering in RAG; Extensive prompt testing
